alert.note: Alert for Ben Hill; Berrien; Brooks; Colquitt; Cook; Irwin; Lanier; Lowndes; Thomas; Tift (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 17 at 1:37AM EST until December 17 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of the Big Bend of Florida, including the following areas, Coastal Dixie, Coastal Jefferson, Coastal Taylor, Inland Dixie, Inland Jefferson, Inland Taylor, Lafayette and Madison and south central Georgia, including the following areas, Ben Hill, Berrien, Brooks, Colquitt, Cook, Irwin, Lanier, Lowndes, Thomas and Tift. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Storm total rainfall amounts of 3 to 5 inches are expected with isolated higher amounts. With the ground saturated from previous rainfall, flooding is possible. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Ben Hill; Berrien; Brooks; Colquitt; Cook; Irwin; Lanier; Lowndes; Thomas; Tift
